items.title: Trump targets more law firms
items.description: President Trump tightened the screws on the law firm Susman Godfrey LLP for actions the administration deemed to be against the government.

items.title: Trump moves to modernize the Defense Department procurement process
items.description: President Trump is aiming to modernize the Department of Defense by improving the procurement process and weapons sales to U.S. allies.
